title: Richard Dawkins - Wikipedia
snippet: He returned to the University of Oxford in 1970 as a lecturer. In 1990 he became a reader in zoology. In 1995, he was appointed Simonyi Professor for the Public Understanding of Science at Oxford, a position that had been endowed by Charles Simonyi with the express intention that the holder ...

title: Richard Dawkins' homepage at Oxford University
snippet: I have no official web site. John Catalano has an excellent unofficial one which does everything I could possibly do if I had a site of my own, and much more. It is located at · Quite apart from material connected with me and my books, his pages are a superb resource on all kinds of scientific ...

title: Richard Dawkins - Oxford Reference
snippet: (1941– )British scientist whose books on genetics and evolution have found a wide general readership.Born in Nairobi, Kenya, Dawkins studied at Oxford, then taught at the University of California, Berkeley (1967–69), before returning to Oxford as a fellow of New College.

title: The Oxford Book of Modern Science Writing (Oxford Landmark Science): Dawkins, Richard: 9780199216819: Amazon.com: Books
snippet: Richard Dawkins taught zoology at the University of California at Berkeley and at Oxford University and is now the Charles Simonyi Professor of the Public Understanding of Science at Oxford, a position he has held since 1995.
